package.name: psi_designators
package.description: The psi_designators package provides designators that encapsulate psi queries. A Psi query is a Prolog-query posed to a reasoning engine. Sometimes, such a reasoner provides multiple answers for a query, of which only one is needed. A PsiDesignator encapsulates the process posing the query, filtering, sorting and selecting an answer and possibly converting it to some datatype as well.
package.author: Loy van Beek
